metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1579 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: UDM provides support for running commands after a download is completed, this is currently made use of for click package installation. This functionality was not restricted to unconfined applications. Before UDM version 1.2+16.04.20160408-0ubuntu1 any confined application could make use of the UDM C++ API to run arbitrary commands in an unconfined environment as the phablet user.

criterions.comment: ubuntu-download-manager: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
